Headline: 95th bound  Red Line Service Delayed at Sox 35th.
ShortDescription: 95th bound  Red Line trains are standing at Sox 35th. due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th bound  Red Line trains are standing at Sox 35th. due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.
